comments.content: It looks very close to **[P22 Underground Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131609/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=P22&ffam=P22UndergroundBold%20-%20Regular&fid=7bf0e8b1fdb9f559065fe489560b751e&fsize=36&text=MAGNUS%20VON%20WELCK%20PAJOUH%20JULES%201ONDO%20UND%201ONES%2013.O4.12&wrap=2)** by Edward Johnston (P22) with a customized /O in place of zero digit
